targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle", job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.
panels.title: Disk Read Average Wait Time

panels.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.
panels.title: Disk Write Average Wait Time

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device
panels.title: Disk Read IOps Completed

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device
panels.title: Disk Write IOps Completed
